lines.text: Well, we were able to find out his name was Cleaver. Ray Cleaver. He was pretty freaky, huh?
These are wild animals - dangerous creatures, worthless forms of life.
But it is killing! Your are perverted!
Oh, Bambi, Bambi, Bambi! You're living in a dream world! It is a fantasy! Why you think every animal's a goddamn Bambi!
As I was saying, cropping is necessary to conserve our wildlife. Gets rid of the old males and old barren females. Gives the younger animals a chance to reproduce, which makes a herd strong.
What it amounts to is killing. And you can say what you like - it's not fun for anything to die!
Hey Fleming, you got it bad. Lucky for you I'm here to put you out of your misery.
